mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT t.id,t.param_name,t.param_name_cn,t.param_test_value, t.param_required,(CASE t.param_required WHEN TRUE THEN '是' WHEN FALSE THEN '否' END ) requiredName, t.param_type,(SELECT d.dic_name FROM system_dic d WHERE d.dic_type='interface_param_type' AND d.dic_value=t.param_type) paramTypeName, t.param_status,(SELECT d.dic_name FROM system_dic d WHERE d.dic_type='system_data_status' AND d.dic_value=t.param_status) statusName, t.param_tree,(SELECT d.dic_name FROM system_dic d WHERE d.dic_type='param_tree_type' AND d.dic_value=t.param_tree) treeType, t.parent_id,(select i.param_name from interface_request_params i WHERE t.parent_id = i.id) parentName, t.common_flag,t.description,t.note,t.update_time,t.create_time FROM interface_request_params t WHERE t.interface_id= #{interface_id} AND t.param_status != '3' ORDER BY t.common_flag ASC ,t.parent_id ASC,t.update_time DESC ) a UNION SELECT * FROM ( SELECT t.id,t.param_name,t.param_name_cn,t.param_test_value, t.param_required,(CASE t.param_required WHEN TRUE THEN '是' WHEN FALSE THEN '否' END ) requiredName, t.param_type,(SELECT d.dic_name FROM system_dic d WHERE d.dic_type='interface_param_type' AND d.dic_value=t.param_type) paramTypeName, t.param_status,(SELECT d.dic_name FROM system_dic d WHERE d.dic_type='system_data_status' AND d.dic_value=t.param_status) statusName, t.param_tree,(SELECT d.dic_name FROM system_dic d WHERE d.dic_type='param_tree_type' AND d.dic_value=t.param_tree) treeType, t.parent_id,(select i.param_name from interface_request_params i WHERE t.parent_id = i.id) parentName, t.common_flag,t.description,t.note,t.update_time,t.create_time FROM interface_request_params t,system_interface si WHERE t.param_status != '3' AND t.interface_id = si.id AND si.platform_id = #{platform_id} AND si.module_id = #{module_id} AND t.common_flag='1' ORDER BY t.common_flag ASC ,t.parent_id ASC,t.update_time DESC ) b
